title: FS - 1908 L40 Leather University of Chicago Yell - SOLD
author: Eggoman

posts.post_title: FS - 1908 L40 Leather University of Chicago Yell - SOLD
posts.post_content:
For your consideration is this ca. 1908 L40 Leather Chicago University Yell, $20.00, shipped, PayPal Friends & Family, please.

This one features the University’s Yell or Cheer inside a heavily-gilded border along with a Pennant, Baseball Player, and Track Athlete.

If you don’t know, these were issued by the American Tobacco Company of Richmond Virginia and New York, as a Premium in Mogul, Fatima, Piedmont, and Murad Cigarettes and Tobacco in 1908.  It measures ~ 3 ½” by ~2 ⅝”.

It is in EXCELLENT or BETTER condition with virtually all of its Original Gold Leaf being intact.

Although it is a college piece, I think that it would easy display in a pre-War or Chicago Cubs or Chicago White Sox collection.  Please decide if it is nice enough for YOUR collection!

"A commitment to buy takes precedence over ongoing negotiations"

I'll take it: [url]mpeich12@gmail.com[/url]

Thank you,
Mike
